  • java.lang.Object
    • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.animation.AbstractAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener, Animation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BumpAnimation, SlideAnimation, WiggleAnimation

    public abstract class AbstractAnimation
extends Object
implements Animation

    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

      • getImage

        public BufferedImage getImage()
        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Returns the static image associated with this animation. Will typically be the ending image, but this may vary based on the animation style. This method is intended to be called when converting an animation into a static image.
        Specified by:
        getImage in interface Animation
        Returns:
        the image of the animation's final state

      • setComponent

        public void setComponent(JComponent component)
        Description copied from interface: Animation
        Sets the Component in which this animation will take place. This must be set for the animation to function.
        Specified by:
        setComponent in interface Animation
        Parameters:
        component - the GUI element to display in
